name: Kirk Degiorgio
description:
'''Kirk Degiorgio''', also known as '''As One''', is a British [[techno]] [[record producer|producer]] and [[Disc jockey|DJ]]. Born in the late 1960s in [[Stepney]], East London, and raised in Ipswich, [[Suffolk]], he started producing music in the early 1990s.

Between 1998 and 2001, he hosted the "R Solution" show on [[Kiss 100 FM]] alongside [[4hero]] which was influential in the development of [[broken beat]].

He founded the labels A.R.T. Records and Op-Art Records and releases on them as well as B12 Records, [[R&S Records]], New Electronica, and others. His style is a mixture of Detroit-style techno, mixed with [[funk]], [[soul music|soul]] and [[jazz fusion]].

In 2023 he announced his retirement from DJing, citing health reasons.
